alert.note: Alert for Coastal Franklin; Coastal Wakulla; Inland Franklin; Inland Wakulla; Liberty (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 12 at 10:27PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Wakulla, southern Liberty and northeastern Franklin Counties through 1100 PM EDT... At 1027 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 16 miles northwest of Carrabelle, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Sopchoppy, East Camp, Morgan Place, Saint Teresa, Turkey Point, Mcintyre, Sanborn, Owens Bridge, Poplar Camp, Kern, Buckhorn, Wilma, Sumatra, Twin Pole, Curtis Mill, Alligator Point and Panacea-Wakulla Airport. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Franklin; Coastal Wakulla; Inland Franklin; Inland Wakulla; Liberty
